parameters.name: FilterValue
parameters.description: The parameter whose value that you want to query. Fox example, if the value is `FixCmd`, only the `FixCmd` parameter is returned.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: RepoId
parameters.description: The ID of the image repository.

parameters.name: ScanTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the security scan task.

parameters.name: ScanType
parameters.description:
The type of the vulnerability. Valid values:

*   `cve`: image system vulnerability
*   `sca`: image application vulnerability

parameters.name: Severity
parameters.description:
The severity of the vulnerability. Valid values:

*   `High`
*   `Medium`
*   `Low`
*   `Unknown`

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The name of the image tag.

parameters.name: VulQueryKey
parameters.description: The keyword for fuzzy search used in scanning. The value can be a CVE name.
